name: Last Nights of New Chicago
description:
You're a private investigator who's just found word of a bomb planted by vampire hunters that the kindred have named the "Second Inquisition". In their craziness they decided to wipe out the entire city of New Chicago, Human and Vampire alike. You have 30 nights.

A visual novel with rogue like and RPG elements. Disclaimer: It's not supposed to be beaten in one try :)

EDIT: We noticed a few issues with some of the scene loops, fix coming soon ♥
